mojo.description: Mojo to create a local container standalone configuration at a specified directory.

parameter.name: configuration
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Configuration. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: container
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Container. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: daemon
parameter.description: Daemon configuration.

parameter.name: deployables
parameter.description: List of Deployable. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: deployer
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Deployer. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: ignoreFailures
parameter.description: Should the mojo ignore failures if something fails

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to bypass cargo execution.

mojo.description: Display help information on cargo-maven2-plugin. Call mvn cargo:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: Installs a container into a given directory. If the container is already installed nothing happens. The container is defined using the <container> element as described in the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide.

parameter.name: configuration
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Configuration. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: container
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Container. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: daemon
parameter.description: Daemon configuration.

parameter.name: deployables
parameter.description: List of Deployable. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: deployer
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Deployer. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: ignoreFailures
parameter.description: Should the mojo ignore failures if something fails

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to bypass cargo execution.

parameter.name: skip

mojo.description: Start a container using Cargo and wait until user pressed CTRL + C to stop.

parameter.name: configuration
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Configuration. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: container
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Container. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Sets the container id.

parameter.name: containerUrl
parameter.description: Sets the container download URL.

parameter.name: daemon
parameter.description: Daemon configuration.

parameter.name: deployables
parameter.description: List of Deployable. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: deployer
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Deployer. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: ignoreFailures
parameter.description: Should the mojo ignore failures if something fails

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to bypass cargo execution.

parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Configuration. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: container
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Container. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: daemon
parameter.description: Daemon configuration.

parameter.name: deployables
parameter.description: List of Deployable. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: deployer
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Deployer. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: ignoreFailures
parameter.description: Should the mojo ignore failures if something fails

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to bypass cargo execution.

mojo.description: Stop a running container using Cargo.

parameter.name: configuration
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Configuration. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: container
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Container. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: daemon
parameter.description: Daemon configuration.

parameter.name: deployables
parameter.description: List of Deployable. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: deployer
parameter.description: Configures a Cargo Deployer. See the Cargo Maven 2 / Maven 3 plugin reference guide for more details.

parameter.name: ignoreFailures
parameter.description: Should the mojo ignore failures if something fails

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to 'true' to bypass cargo execution.

parameter.name: archive
parameter.description: The archive configuration to use. See Maven Archiver Reference.

parameter.name: descriptor
parameter.description: The file name to use for the merge descriptor.

parameter.name: descriptorId
parameter.description: The id to use for the merge descriptor.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: The directory for the generated WAR.

parameter.name: resolveDependencies
parameter.description: Attempt to resolve dependencies, rather than simply merging the files in WEB-INF/lib. This is an experimental feature.

parameter.name: warName
parameter.description: The name of the generated WAR.
